Octopus: Functions to Octopus sensor by ELECFREAKS Co.,Ltd.
Octopus.NeoPixelMode: Different modes for RGB or RGB+W NeoPixel strips
Octopus.Strip.clear:
Turn off all LEDs.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
Octopus.Strip.range|param|length: number of LEDs in the range. eg: 4
Octopus.Strip.range|param|start: offset in the LED strip to start the range
Octopus.Strip.rotate:
Rotate LEDs forward.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
Octopus.Strip.rotate|param|offset: number of pixels to rotate forward, eg: 1
Octopus.Strip.setBrightness: Set the brightness of the strip. This flag only applies to future operation.
Octopus.Strip.setBrightness|param|bright: a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 255
Octopus.Strip.setPin: Set the pin where the neopixel is connected, defaults to P0.
Octopus.Strip.shift:
Shift LEDs forward and clear with zeros.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
Octopus.Strip.shift|param|offset: number of pixels to shift forward, eg: 1
Octopus.Strip.show: Send all the changes to the strip.
Octopus.Strip.showColor: Shows all LEDs to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
Octopus.Strip.showRainbow: Shows a rainbow pattern on all LEDs.
Octopus.Strip.showRainbow|param|endHue: the end hue value for the rainbow, eg: 360
Octopus.Strip.showRainbow|param|startHue: the start hue value for the rainbow, eg: 1
Octopus.TM1637LEDs._dat: set data to TM1637, with given bit
Octopus.TM1637LEDs.showNumber: Show a 4 digits number on display
Octopus.TM1637LEDs.showbit: Show a single number from 0 to 9 at a specified digit of Grove - 4-Digit Display
Octopus.buttonEvent: TODO: Judge whether the button is pressed
Octopus.buttonSensor: TODO: Judge whether the button is pressed
Octopus.colors: Gets the RGB value of a known color
Octopus.create: Create a new NeoPixel driver for `numleds` LEDs.
Octopus.create|param|numleds: number of leds in the strip, eg: 24,30,60,64
Octopus.hsl: Converts a hue saturation luminosity value into a RGB color
Octopus.rgb: Converts red, green, blue channels into a RGB color
Octopus.rgb|param|blue: value of the blue channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
Octopus.rgb|param|green: value of the green channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
Octopus.rgb|param|red: value of the red channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
Octopus.tm1637Create: Create a new driver Grove - 4-Digit Display
Octopus.trackingSensor: TODO: Acquisition of line inspection sensor
Octopus.trimpotSensor: TODO: Get the value of the potentiometer(0~1023)
WuKong: Functions to WuKong multifunctional expansion board by ELECFREAKS Co.,Ltd.
WuKong.lightIntensity: TODO: Set the brightness of on-board LED lamp.
WuKong.mecanumWheel|param|LeftFront: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S1
WuKong.mecanumWheel|param|LeftRear: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S2
WuKong.mecanumWheel|param|RightFront: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S3
WuKong.mecanumWheel|param|RightRear: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S4
WuKong.setLightMode: TODO: Set the on-board LED display mode.
WuKong.setMotorSpeed: TODO: Set the speed of M1 or M2 motor.
WuKong.setMotorSpeed|param|motor: M1 or M2 motor , eg: MotorList.M1
